title: Ticket #1775: Condor_compile should exit with non-zero status on clipped platforms
description: On clipped platforms, condor_compile currently prints an error message and exits with status 0. It should exit with a non-zero status, indicating that it did not complete the requested operation.
remarks:

Pushed fix to V7_4-branch for 7.4.5.
check_ins: 2010-Nov-17 14:04   Check-in [19418]: Make condor_compile exit with status 2 on clipped platforms. #1775 Before, it exited with status 0, suggesting that it was able to produce a standard universe binary. (By Jaime Frey )
